name: Scorpio
review: Our Ass got kicked real bad , really really bad , and you know what our fighters were afraid of the team even before we started fighting,let alone we can win.

name: Epictetus
review: We are stoics , we dont fight , We tell everyone to not fight. These people at the Fight are really really bad.

name: Seneca
review: Peace , Inner Peace is all we want. We can't change the world , we can't control the actions of others. But we can change ourseleves and control actions of selves, so will come the happiness.
